message.content:
1. Participants were tested in three dual-task experimental conditions.
2. The experimental conditions varied in complexity.
3. The first experimental condition was auditory word recognition and visual processing.
4. The second experimental condition was auditory working memory (word) and visual processing.
5. The third experimental condition was auditory working memory (sentence) and visual processing in noise.
6. All participants were tested in each experimental condition.
7. The experimental conditions involved both auditory and visual tasks.
8. The auditory tasks in the conditions involved either word recognition or working memory.
9. The visual task in all conditions was visual processing.
10. The third condition added an element of noise to the visual processing task.

messages.content:
Statement: All participants were tested in each of the following three dual-task experimental conditions, which were varying in complexity: (1) auditory word recognition + visual processing, (2) auditory working memory (word) + visual processing, and (3) auditory working memory (sentence) + visual processing in noise.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
